result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam A. Brown was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate w/o Valid License(3rd+ w/in3Yrs), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.05(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Bond previously posted in the amount of $300 has been applied. Remaining costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
Defendant is entitled to Good Time Credit and Huber Privileges.
Uncharged bail jumping stemming from this charge and the defendant's bond in Green Lake County Case No. 15CM51 dismissed and read in. DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam A. Brown

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Court vacates stay-120 days to serve or balance of $2822.78 to be PIF

Def did post $193 last night as to 15CM-151.  The Court:  Lifts the stay of contempt sentence due to the muliple opportunities given for payment.  Stay vacated and will require the 120 days to be served.  Sentence to be served forthwith unless full payment is owed.  Alternative will be considered upon a payment being made.

Case called @ 9:25 a.m. Defendant Adam A. Brown in court.  Steven Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. The parties have reached an agreement and are prepared to proceed to sentencing today.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Plea: NC.  Court accepts plea and enters JOC. Uncharged Bail Jumping charge stemming from these charges and a bond DE was on in Green Lake Co Case 15CM51 - DRI.  Sentencing recommendation by ADA Anderson. Statement by DE regarding sentencing. Court orders: 15 days WCJ - Huber, GT, No CFTS - Sentence to commence by no later than 8/1/2015, Costs w/ 60 DTP or PP, DNA sample and surcharge. Bond previously posted to be applied. Appeal rights given.

Status conference at 06-09-2015 09:20 am.
Pre-trial conference at 05-21-2015 09:30 am.
No operation of any motor vehicles whatsoever.

Case Called @ 2:15 PM: Defendant Adam A. Brown in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel.  Def wishes counsel.  NGP received and entered.   Def changes his mind and requests to speak with the State on his own before deciding on counsel issue.  PTC/STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Cash Bond ordered w/conditions.  Status conference scheduled for June 9, 2015 at 09:20 am.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 21, 2015 at 09:30 am.
